product_name: Woolrich Cross Country Plaid Tech Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Woolrich Cross Country plaid tech shirt has plenty of trail-ready features but features a classic plaid pattern that makes it easy to stop for dinner after a day of outdoor fun. Lightweight nylon wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly to keep you comfortable even if you start to sweat; rear mesh vents promote breathability. Built-in UPF 40 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Double-layered chest pockets with front flap closure; left chest pocket features rip-and-stick side entry pocket; right chest pocket features zippered side entry pocket. Woolrich Cross Country plaid tech shirt is wrinkle-resistant for easy traveling; long sleeves convert to short sleeves with button tab fasteners. Closeout.
short_description: The Woolrich Cross Country plaid tech shirt has plenty of trail-ready features but features a classic plaid pattern that makes it easy to stop for dinner after a day of outdoor fun.
